comments.author: Coyster
comments.body: E get when Bitcoin mining dey easy, you fit just sit down with your laptop dey mine Bitcoin, but that time many people especially for our own part of the world no sabi wetin Bitcoin be, so i no sure say e get anybody wey dey for this our local section wey mine Bitcoin that time. As the matter be now, e dey almost impossible to mine Bitcoin for Naija, because of electricity cost and the cost of arranging a mining rig and buying the mining machines. If you dey find as you go accumulate Bitcoin, i go advive you make you just dey buy am steadily with Naira, no look that mining side.Quote from: Ambatman on May 07, 2023, 06:03:29 PMI just find out say this forum dey since 2009, but why e nor popular? because me just find out this yearShay na this year you garner interest for Bitcoin right? Na so e be, the forum dey popular to people wey dey interested in Bitcoin.

comments.author: Amphenomenon
comments.body: Currently, no member of this forum in Nigeria mine bitcoin but that doesn't mean Nigerians don't mine bitcoin. There have been discussions about Nigerian bitcoin miners in this board, you join the discussion there :Bitcoin miners in Nigeria  Quote from: Ambatman on May 07, 2023, 06:03:29 PMI find out say many people here dey code abeg coding dey important to mine Bitcoin?Coding is not needed to mine bitcoin, what you need is an ASICs hardware.Quote from: Ambatman on May 07, 2023, 06:03:29 PMI go like know how e b wen una start una miningLike no institute dey wey dey teach am so how una take grow una knowledgeRead this thread to understand Bitcoin mining BITCOIN MINING INTRO & RULES OF THIS SUBFORUM - READ BEFORE POSTING

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Quote from: Ambatman on May 07, 2023, 06:03:29 PMI go like know how e b wen una start una miningLike no institute dey wey dey teach am so how una take grow una knowledgeSince I dey this forum I never really notice any Nigerian when dey mine bitcoin so most of the answer you'll receive here wii just be based on what they understand and not what they have experienced, but incase you're really interested in learning the in-to-to of mining then you probably should consider following the link provided by @Amphenomenon and ask question there although it won't be just mining in Nigeria aloneÂ  but mining inn general.QuoteI just find out say this forum dey since 2009, but why e nor popular? because me just find out this yearMost people discover about 'this forum' from a friend or someone close to them; however, only a small percentage of those who are truly interested in bitcoin find the site on their own. I'm not sure the category you fall into but I hope you get the knowledge that you seek.QuoteOur light matter nor dey affect the mining machine?I'm not sure how well electricity is supplied in your area, but if you're the type that receives constant electricity for more than 12 hours a day, it might not be a problem for you, but if you're the type that receives "two to four" hours light, it will be a huge hindrance for you unless you have another alternative to generate your own electricity to power your mining rig. Remember the cost of electricity also matters here.Quoteif I wan start mining wetin go b d challenge wey I go faceApart from electricity, the only obstacle you'll face is funds to purchase a mining machine. You should understand that you cannot mine bitcoin with any system. You've probably come across some website advertising that you can mine through their mining cloud by just paying a charge and leaving your PC connected to their server, but you can't.To mine, you'll need to invest in some ASIC hardware.QuoteI find out say many people here dey code abeg coding dey important to mine Bitcoin?Don't be suprised when you find out that your claim is not totally correct as majority of people here don't really know how to coding most just know only the basic of some programming languages nothing more. And to your question, yes, you can mine without knowing how to coding.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Quote from: Ambatman on May 07, 2023, 06:03:29 PMI find out say many people here dey code abeg coding dey important to mine Bitcoin?You do not need to know about coding or programing before you can be a miner. Let me explain further:Bitcoin miners needs miners (ASICs) and electricity. If the miner can not be a mining pool, he will need to join a mining pool. A miner should know how to calculate the electricity he is using and if it is going to be profitable. This is more about basic mathematics and basic physics. There are even mining calculators on some online sites or mining pool sites.

comments.author: Coyster
comments.body: Quote from: Davidvictorson on May 09, 2023, 04:11:04 AME get pipo wey dey mine sha but those people na the big boys and girls wey their pockets deep well well and dem fit control factors like electricity or any alternative source of energy, dem get enough equipment and space to take set up and other things too.That one dey sha, even if Naija get miners e go dey very few. Mind you that no be to get deep pockets be the koko, the main thing na to make profit from your mining investment, why you think say miners dey relocate go where electricity and other conditions dey cheaper/favorable, na because them wan make profit na, no be say dem no fit arrange mining rig for their country. So you fit dey rich for Naija, buy all the things wey you need, but based on the money you dey spend on things wey you suppose get for cheap, mining no go dey profitable for you and you go gats shut am down, another thing na competition, if you go fit generate enough hashrate to compete with other miners, the best thing in such situation na to join an extant big mining pool sha, and earn based on the hashrate wey your individual miner dey contribute, e no easy oh.
